extension.dc:title: GBIF Relevé
extension.name: Releve
extension.dc:description: Support for vegetation plot survey (relevé) measurements ancillary to those reported using Event core with Occurrence extension.

property.name: releveNumber
property.dc:description: Relevé number

property.name: reference
property.dc:description: A related resource that references, cites, or otherwise points to the described relevé
property.examples: "Weevers, T. 1940. De flora van Goeree en Overflakkee dynamisch beschouwd. Nederlandsch Kruidkundig Archief 50: 285-354."

property.name: coverScale
property.dc:description: Cover scale

property.name: project
property.dc:description: The name or code for the project associated with the relevé

property.name: syntaxon
property.dc:description: The code for the syntaxon (plant community type) associated with the relevé

property.name: exposition
property.dc:description: The Aspect: the compass direction that the relevé site faces

property.name: inclination
property.dc:description: The angle of inclination of the relevé site in degrees, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: coverTotal
property.dc:description: The total cover (%) of all plants, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: coverTrees
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of trees, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: coverShrubs
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of shrubs, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: coverHerbs
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of the herb layer, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: coverMosses
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of mosses, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: coverLichens
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of lichens, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: coverAlgae
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of algae, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: coverLitter
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of litter, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: highTreeLayerHeight
property.dc:description: The height in metres of the high tree layer

property.name: lowTreeLayerHeight
property.dc:description: The height in metres of the low tree layer

property.name: highShrubLayerHeight
property.dc:description: The height in metres of the high shrub layer

property.name: lowShrubLayerHeight
property.dc:description: The height in metres of the low shrub layer

property.name: highHerbLayerMeanHeight
property.dc:description: The mean height in centimetres of the high herb layer

property.name: lowHerbLayerMeanHeight
property.dc:description: The mean height in centimetres of the low herb layer

property.name: herbLayerMaximumHeight
property.dc:description: The maximum height in centimetres of the herb layer

property.name: meanHeightCryptogamLayer
property.dc:description: The mean height in milliimetres of the cryptogam layer

property.name: mossesIdentified
property.dc:description: The value is true if mosses in the releve were identified

property.name: lichensIdentified
property.dc:description: The value is true if lichens in the releve were identified
